recipesJson.name: Custard Cracked
recipesJson.author: DIYDownunderPippa
recipesJson.description:
I want a custard that is silky smooth, sweet but not to sweet, has some eggyness but not to eggy. I just want a custard that is full flavored, enjoyable and doesn't take a year to to steep.
It's taken a long time, but finally I have cracked it!

This is Custard Cracked!

An extraordinary mix of full bodied flavorful custard that is balanced and blissful.

Creme Brulee - Offers body and dark sweetness.
Legendary Custard - gives this a lovely surface of the custard mouthfeel.
Marshmallow Vanilla - Volumises, sweetens and the vanilla is delicious!
Sweet Cream - Blends here to assist to keep the body smooth
Toffee Ice Cream - Assists the sweetness and body of flavour.

I hope you enjoy mixing this as much as I have enjoyed this creative process. Let me know what you thought in the comments below.

Allow 5 days for best results!

I enjoy this at 60W on a Single 0.2ohm SST coil on a Recurve RDA.

Seriously if you like a solid recipe that works give it a go!

Cheers for reading this far, now go and get mixing!

Enjoy!

"Together, Let's Discover!!!"

Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/groups/diydownunder/
Discord - https://discord.gg/kH4Fqbc

reviews.text: Very nice recipe. Waiting to steep those 5 days. Next time Ill make more! Thank you
What a great recipe  has a great  flavor profile and mouthfeel would definitely recommend . Thanks

An amazing custard that doesn't use custard premium. 
Smooth and sweet with good mouthfeel. Thank you!
